definition: apparently/it seems that
to see/to look at/to read/to watch/to visit/to call on/to consider/to regard as/to look after/to treat (an illness)/to depend on/to feel (that)/(after verb) to give it a try/Watch out! (for a danger)
to look after/to take care of/to watch/to guard
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
in my opinion

sentences.english: Melbury did not seem to be particularly enlightened by this explanation.
sentences.chinese: 麦尔布礼看来对这个解释并不很明白。

sentences.english: Being a woman is synonymous with being a second-class citizen, in her opinion.
sentences.chinese: 在她看来，做女人是做二等公民的同义词。

sentences.english: Worse than the hunger, say local leaders, is the thirst.
sentences.chinese: 但在当地头领看来，比饥饿可怕百倍的是干渴。

sentences.english: However, this came unstuck considering the mechanical layout.
sentences.chinese: 然而，这来未粘住的以机械的地面区划看来。

sentences.english: To me, dreams about flying express feelings about freedom;
sentences.chinese: 就我看来，有关飞翔的梦表达了对自由的渴望。

sentences.english: At first glance, it seems like the sort of story that falls in with the rest of the modern genre.
sentences.chinese: 初看来，这部书似乎与当代流派的其他作品类似。

sentences.english: It seems that you love doing black & white photography, Please explain why.
sentences.chinese: 看来你锺情于从事黑白摄影，请交代何解。

sentences.english: She looked nettled by my remarks.
sentences.chinese: 看来她被我的话激怒了。

sentences.english: For Obama Sr. this was an issue of national autonomy.
sentences.chinese: 在老奥巴马看来，这事关民族自主。

sentences.english: In the opinion of some lofty experts they never quite cohered again.
sentences.chinese: 在某些玄虚的专家看来，他们没有再完全融洽统一过。

sentences.english: You seem to know this place vell well. Have you been here before?
sentences.chinese: 看来你非常熟悉这个地方，你以前来过这里吗？

sentences.english: The other, Albert Ho Chun-yan, is thus a no-hoper.
sentences.chinese: 如此看来，另一位参选者何俊仁是没什么希望了。

sentences.english: But now it eems that all the hard work may have been in vain.
sentences.chinese: 但现在看来，所有的努力都可能白费了。

sentences.english: As I see it, we can't even afford to have him arrested or accused.
sentences.chinese: 在我看来，要是他被捕或受到起诉，那咱就受不了。

sentences.english: Such excuses represent nothing to us at all.
sentences.chinese: 这样的理由，照我们看来，不说明任何问题。

sentences.english: It is audacious, disruptive and preposterous on the face of it.
sentences.chinese: 表面看来，其胆大妄为，且颠覆常理，又荒诞可笑。

definition: really/indeed
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
indeed/really/reliable/real/true
actually/in fact/really
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
clear/evident/obvious(ly)
returning to our main topic,.../that said,.../again,.../in this connection/in passing/nevertheless,.../anyhow
apparently/to seem/to appear/as if/seemingly
in fact/in reality/actually/as a matter of fact/de facto/ipso facto
to believe/to think/to consider/to feel
however/yet/but
but/however
to be certain/to be positive/assuredly/definitely/to give recognition/to affirm/affirmative (answer)
this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
to appear to be/to seem as if
